summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6166 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 45, T. Hanford's Addition to South Seattle, being the alley between 14th Avenue South and 15th Avenue South from Hanford Street to Winthrop Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same, uner Ordinance No. 86375, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
